name: Dungeon Jump (IIIarp)
description:
Dungeon Jump

Help Fred to escape from the mysterious dungeon!

Fred needs to get out of the dungeon safe and sound.

However, the dungeon is teeming with dangers that excite all the senses inside.

Fast spiders, bats, unexpected finds from the ground in the form of sharp thorns - all this threatens Fred's safety.

The most important thing in this story is that fate gives the main character gifts in the form of magical enhancements, which can certainly help to overcome all difficulties, but …

Only you can help him!

___________________________________________________________

Regards to Elthen for provided minions:
https://elthen.itch.io/

Regards to Matheus Frantz for provided fire animation:
https://msfrantz.itch.io/

Keys were found through the Google.

Other stuff was drawn myself.

___________________________________________________________

This is a first working demo, future plans:

  1. Add achievements
  2. Add more minions
  3. Add map variations (maybe levels)
